```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(DT)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

```{r warning=FALSE}
qualities <- read.csv(params$qualities, sep = ',')
```

# Summary

Imputed SNPs: `r sum(qualities$count_Rsq)`

# Imputation Quality by MAF


```{r warning=FALSE}
ggplot(qualities) + geom_line(aes(x=MAF, y=mean_Rsq, fill=1)) + facet_wrap(~source) + ylim(c(0,1))
```
